title: Is autofill necessary?
body:
I want to Play with my friends and we had to wait 3 champ selects and after this I got Support autofill...
This is just annoying and when this is Happening I dont want to Play LoL anymore. I hope that you would get this out.

replies.body: Kinda, otherwise the boards will be filled with "omg fix the 40 minute queues" again
Unless your masters+ when yoill be placed with low diamonds and have to wait 2 hours.
